articles.image_title: RAMSTEIN-MIESENBACH, GERMANY - APRIL 26: Delegates sit in the plenum of the Ukraine Security Consultative Group meeting at Ramstein air base on April 26, 2022 in Ramstein-Miesenbach, Germany.
